name: hell hound
traits_and_actions:
Skills
Perception +5
Damage immunities
fire
Senses
darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15
Languages
understands Infernal but can’t speak it
Keen hearing and smell.
The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
Pack tactics.
The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.
Actions
Bite.
Melee weapon attack:
+5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit:
7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.
Fire breath
(Recharge 5–6).
The hound exhales fire in a 15-­âfoot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
